title: Client thinks i'm still in game.
body:
1. I noticed my ip hadn't updated after game so i closed and reopened the client 
2.The client tried to enter the loading screen then realized the game wasn't there gave me a message saying it could not find the game and to check my internet 
3.I clicked cancel 
Results: The lobby returned to the reconnect screen and any further attempts to close and reopen and sign in to the client yielded the same results

replies.body: Sounds like a ghost game, meaning the server didn't pick up that the match ended.  Glad everything is okay now!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4bEJOjz9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-06T18:43:50.733+0000)
>
> Sounds like a ghost game, meaning the server didn't pick up that the match ended.  Glad everything is okay now!

yep yep thx for the response
Closed my client for an hour and it works again
